label: SchemeOrProgram
comment: A formal governance scheme under which this attestation is issued (eg ACRS structural steel certification)

datatypeProperties.comment: The date of issue of the scheme.
The unique identifier of this conformity attestation
The issuing body of the conformity scheme.
The name of the conformity scheme (eg ACRS structural steel certification)
The trust mark that represents the conformity assessment scheme.

referencedBy.comment: A list of relevant standards and/or regulations against which apply to this attestation (eg AS1163:2016).
